text: received a visit from him:I have today seen Count Gamba - which was very distressing for many reasons but quite unavoidable - he is a pleasing, fine looking young man spoke with great feeling. The unfortunate Augusta was in one of her worst states of confusion.
handwritten_text: received a visit from him:I have today seen Count Gamba - which was very distressing for many reasons but quite unavoidable - he is a pleasing, fine looking young man spoke with great feeling. The unfortunate Augusta was in one of her worst states of confusion.
